dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5147 IH: Investing in Veteran Entrepreneurial Talents Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Kiggans of Virginia (for herself, Mr. Mrvan, Mr. Hunt, Mr. Davis of North Carolina, and Ms. Pettersen) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Act to increase certain goal for participation in Federal contracts by small business concerns owned and controlled by service-disabled veterans, to exclude such self-certified concerns from governmentwide and Federal agency goals, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Investing in Veteran Entrepreneurial Talents Act or the Investing in VETS Act.

section.header: Increase in Governmentwide goal for participation in Federal contracts by small business concerns owned and controlled by service-disabled veterans
section.text: Section 15(g)(1)(A)(ii) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 644(g)(1)(A)(ii)) is amended by striking 3 percent and inserting 5 percent.

section.header: Exclusion of self-certified SDVOSBs from Governmentwide and agency goals
section.text: Section 15(g) of such Act (15 U.S.C. 644(g)) is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.header: Exclusion of self-Certified SDVOSBs from goals
paragraph.text: Only small business concerns owned and controlled by service-disabled veterans that have been certified under section 36 shall be included in calculating the goals establishedâ€”

subparagraph.text: by the head of a Federal agency for small business concerns owned and controlled by service-disabled veterans under paragraph (2).
